56661.summary: Some customers in the Rutland area of Kelowna are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56661.title: Dec 31 - Kelowna (Rutland) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
